verses.roman:
āmā-sabā-saṅge kṛṣṇa-kathā, bhāgavata śune
tāhāra parīkṣā kailuṅ āmi-dui-jane

synonyms: āmā-sabā—all of us; saṅge—with; kṛṣṇa-kathā—talks about Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhāgavata śune—hears Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; tāhāra—his; parīkṣā—examination; kailuṅ—did; āmi-dui-jane—both of us.
translation: "He heard Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam and talks about Lord Kṛṣṇa with us, and both of us examined him.
